title: Will duoing with someone for placement matches affect my rating after 10 games?
body: Just wondering if i duoed with someone during my placements, would it change my rating?

replies.body: Yes it will, not much maybe the difference of 1 div (silver 3 or silver 4) where u would get silver 4 and someone with the same result, but not duoing gets silver 3.
Wow.. so i actually got Silver 3 lol

I duoed with a Gold 5 mate when i was doing my placements and got Bronze 1 but later i climb myself to S5. I got lucky with teams they knew what they were doing to win, i main support so i rely on them to do the damage, i just warded alot and keep the carries off my ADC.
